1.name: Advance to Illinois Ave. – If you pass Go, collect $200

2.name: Advance to St. Charles Place – If you pass Go, collect $200

3.name: Advance token to the nearest Utility. If unowned, you may buy it. If owned, pay owner 10x the dice roll.

4.name: Advance token to the nearest Railroad and pay owner twice the rental. If unowned, you may buy it.

6.name: Get out of Jail Free – This card may be kept until needed or sold.

8.name: Go to Jail – Go directly to Jail – Do not pass Go – Do not collect $200

9.name: Make general repairs on all your property – For each house pay $25 – For each hotel pay $100

11.name: Take a trip to Reading Railroad – If you pass Go, collect $200

12.name: Take a walk on the Boardwalk – Advance token to Boardwalk

13.name: You have been elected Chairman of the Board – Pay each player $50

15.name: Advance to the nearest Railroad. Pay owner twice the rental. If unowned, you may buy it.
